Talk_0020: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Don't I know you, traveler?<sp:5:1:0> Good evenin'!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Don't I know you, traveler?<sp:5:1:0> Coming out
here while it's all soggy, huh? Interesting.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hey there! You just passing through?
Mind if I yammer at ya for a sec?

I've heard things have gotten pretty
bad in <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.

The workers aren't working, includin' my
pals at <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff> who live to work!

Do you know what's goin' on over there?
I'm worried...
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>As a traveler, I figured you might know
something about whatever's happening
in <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.
I heard that my pals at <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
have shut down production and are
sittin' on their haunches.
Just what's goin' on?<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>From what I've been hearin', <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff> is
back in business!

Which means I'd better hurry up and
finish work out here so I can get back
to <clr:0000>YunoboCo HQ<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Careful, now. The ground is uneven, what
with all the debris everywhere.

If you wander around without payin'
attention, you might end up fallin' down
a hole...
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>That's the mining team founded by our
wonderful President Yunobo. Or Prez
for short.
If ya see someone wearin' a blue uniform
with a pickax logo on it, they work for
<clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>. Like me!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Normally, we'd be off minin' ore outta
caves near <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, but lately a buncha
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> fell down in the area.
I heard the folks out here needed help
clearin' it all out, so I came to pitch in.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00>Word is things are still real bad in
<clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.

My pals at <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>still aren't working.
What could be goin' on...
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You a traveler?<sp:5:1:0>


Careful, now. The ground is uneven, what
with all the debris everywhere. I wouldn't
wander around too much, if I were you.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's home to all Gorons, located <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>
of here in the Eldin region.

If ya look off that way, you can see
<clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>. Goron City's at the
base of it.
But lately the mountain's been looking
kinda...<sp:5:0:0>different. Makes a fella
uneasy, yanno?
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>Aside from that, I've also been hearin'
<clr:0000>bothersome things <clr:ffff>about the Gorons back
home. I'm so worried, I can barely work...
See, we Gorons are a friendly and
hard-workin' sort. We never get up
to any kind of trouble.
But I'm told even my pals at <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>
have stopped production. Somethin's
just not right...
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Sounds like <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff> is up and running
again. I wanna wrap this work up quickly
and head back to <clr:0000>YunoboCo HQ<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>I've been away for a while, and things
have gotten bad back home... Just what's
happening over there?
Talk_0009: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Don't I know you, traveler?<sp:5:1:0> Good mornin'!
